author: Guest (Guest)
title: Working in different distros
text:
This works great for me using my US Cellular BlackBerry 9630 Tour. I had to modify the "uscellular.conf" file because there was no ".conf" at the end of the last line referring to uscellular-chat.conf. Once I had corrected this oversight, everything went smoothly.

So far, I have used this with Ubuntu 8.10, 9.04, and 9.10, #!CrunchBang 9.04.01, Mint 7 and Fedora Core 12 (good luck finding all the files required for this one). I have not tried it with any distro running KDE, XFCE, or LXDE, but it did work well in Openbox.
